item.description:
LADIES ONLY PSYCHIC PARTY
Hosted by Jon Stetson at the Cape Codder Resort & Spa

He's performed at the White House, for Donald Trump and on the A&E TV Network. Now Jon Stetson, "America's Master Mentalist," has brought "The Ladies Only Psychic Party" to the Cape Codder Resort.

The "Ladies Only Psychic Party" is a brand new, fun-filled experience, where audience members will Live, Love, Laugh, and Learn! You will be enthralled by new demonstrations of Jon's unique brand of psychic entertainment.

You will be empowered to understand and further develop your own psychic skills. Participants will, indeed, amaze themselves and discover their unlimited potential.

Jon will introduce you to "The Jewel", awakening your intuition. It is his own secret to happiness and the key to unlimited energy! The evening will conclude with a seldom-seen demonstration of a "Crystal Gazing" Gallery reading!

Jon Stetson began the study of the mystic arts at a very early age and has been blessed to receive formal training from some very gifted and proficient mystics, psychics, clairvoyants, and teachers over the years.

Jon's charismatic and lively demonstrations provide his audiences and individual clients with a rare opportunity to experience the fascinating phenomenon of an intuitive experience, which he delivers with his distinctive style of humor, intensity, and compassion. This has made Jon a much sought-after speaker, entertainer, and guide.

Jon's aim is to offer insight to his clients and inspire them to a better understanding of their own nature. Being one of the most respected Intuitive Readers on the world stage, Jon takes his work seriously and treats it with the utmost integrity and respect.

 

TICKETS: $25.00 to be purchased individually

By calling reservations: 888-297-2200.  Ask to be seated with Sharon Christensen. 

Show starts at 7:00 pm!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing at pink coat & my Girls' Just Wanna Have Fun Pin!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group
